#summary AO: Annotation Ontology

== AO: Annotation Ontology ==

The Annotation Ontology is a vocabulary for defining several kind of annotations - comment, entities annotation (or semantic tags), textual annotation (classic tags), notes, erratum... - on potentially any kind of document (text, images, audio...) and document part.
